SqlClientEventSource.summary: This class implements class and provides ability to create events for event tracing for Windows(ETW).

Log.summary: This is the singleton instance of the class.

Keywords.summary: This class provides supported Keywords from an EventSource consumer point of view, but these definitions are not needed outside this class.

Trace.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'Trace' events for listening implementation.

Scope.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'Scope' events for listening implementation.

NotificationTrace.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'NotificationTrace' events for listening implementation.

Pooling.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'Pooling' events for listening implementation.

Correlation.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'Correlation' events for listening implementation.

NotificationScope.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'NotificationScope' events for listening implementation.

PoolerScope.summary: Enabling this event turns on the 'PoolerScope' events for listening implementation.

PoolerTrace.summary: Enabling this event turns on 'PoolerTrace' events for listening implementation.

Advanced.summary: Enabling this event turns on 'Advanced' events for listening implementation.
